#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n1, n2;
    int c=0, carry=0;
    while(cin>>n1>>n2 && (n1!=0 && n2!=0))
    {
        while(n1!=0 || n2!=0)
        {
            c = n1%10 + n2%10 + c;
            if(c >= 10)
            {
                carry++;
                c = c/10;
            }
            else
                c = 0;
            n1 = n1/10;
            n2 = n2/10;
        }
        if(carry == 0)
        cout << "No carry operation." << endl;
        else if(carry == 1)
        cout << carry << " carry operation." << endl;
        else
        cout << carry << " carry operations." << endl;
        carry = 0;
    }
    return 0;
}
